name: Tourney
description: Tourney is a collaboration of tech and sport. At least, that is where the inspiration came from. Tourney would feel at home on a space ship or in a stadium. The lightest weight of Tourney (100) is almost an outline and that "stroke" thickens as the weights increase. 900 is completely solid. To contribute, see github.com/Etcetera-Type-Co/Tourney .
author: Tyler Finck, ETC
